mapper.insert: insert into error_log (log_id, error_time, error_msg,error_code, error_type,log) values (#{logId}, #{errorTime}, #{errorMsg}, #{errorType},#{log},#{errorCode}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE log_id=#{logId}, error_time= #{errorTime}, error_msg = #{errorMsg}, error_type = #{errorType}, log = #{log}, error_code = #{errorCode}
